dict.acceptation: 埋葬，葬；为…举行葬礼；隐藏，埋藏，遮盖，掩蔽；专心致志于，埋头于，沉溺于；

sent.orig: Right after dinner, George would go into the study and bury himself in his work.
sent.trans: 乔治总是一吃完饭就走进书房埋头工作。

sent.orig: Bury your head too deep, and you will begin to dive towards the bottom.
sent.trans: 但如果你的头部埋得过深，则有向下潜游之虞！

sent.orig: Lava flows can burn, crush, or bury anything in their path.
sent.trans: 熔岩流可以烧毁，粉碎并埋葬沿途的所有东西。

sent.orig: I'm here to bury my Moms. You know that.
sent.trans: 我回去参加我妈妈的葬礼。你知道的。

sent.orig: Don't bury your thoughts, put your vision to reality.
sent.trans: 别埋没了你的思想，把目光投向现实。
